From North-South Highway (PLUS), exit at the intersection of Seberang Jaya and looking for Butterworth -Kulim Express (BKL), exit at Kulim-Lunas intersection and turn left. Drive for about 1km and turn left at the traffic light. And this temple is on the left hand side and about 300metre from the main road.
The chinese temple near the river, known as '鲁乃伯公'. The temple was built 100 years ago by some chinese who first reached here.

The famous Lunas roasted duck on the main street of Lunas.
'Wan Tan' Noodle ( Dumpling noodle ) under the tree, is on the way to Padang Serai throught Jalan Lunas.
lunas inn on the same road as pekan lunas
